Name: Mankind
Review Text:
Nice local bar. Quality and price ok. We wanted a small place to taste local snacks. You definitely have to try the fried meatballs with cheese.
Staff were nice but a bit too stressed at the beginning.
They have french menu available with QR code.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Very nice and cozy place to seat and enjoy a drink or a sandwich. Nice small terrace and family service, very much appreciated.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Great sandwiches. Cool staff. Good prices. Nice cozy spot that I plan on visiting again.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: don't enter this place if you are looking for an inclusive and safe space to just relax. It is not safe to order from the middle aged white guy behind the bar (has blue eyes, roughly 1.80 tall, worked on thursday the first of october around noon ). He is rude and will make you uncomfortable. The 'poffertjes' are stale.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: This was a great little bar to stop in the afternoon for a quick drink before a boat tour. The bar is small, cute, and has outdoor seating right on the water. They served us a cold coke and a tasty iced coffee and we relaxed in the sun. The â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: The staff was really friendly and helpful. The sandwiches were awesome, and this was the first time we tried bitterballen, and it became an instant favourite!

Name: Mankind
Review Text:
Honest homemade tasty and cheap food.

Calm and charming location near the canals and not far from museums. â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Super nice place. The best is having a table near the canal. Their IPAs are also very good !

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Found this place on an Amsterdam Gay guide but itâ€™s not any more gay, or straight than anywhere else in this great city. It is , however, a great little restaurant/cafe with outdoor seating by a canal on a quiet street. I loved to come here everyday and have a delicious sandwich and a coffee and watch the neighborhood go by.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: The lady was really nice and friendly and i loved the food. This was the first time i tried bitter ballen and it was awsome <3

Name: Mankind
Review Text:
This Cafe is located in a quiet street, so you can enjoy sitting outside next to the Canal.
The Coffee is excellent aswell. â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Excellent food, very affordable. The location is pretty, close to the canal. The staff is friendly and does speak English. I strongly recommend this place!

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Stumbled here by accident but absolutely loved it. Bartenders and cooks were amazing. Had a sandwich that I would eat again any day.  I look forward to coming back

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Had the Caprese and turkey bacon sandwiches and a couple beers after escaping to the top deck during a rain storm. Good service, decent food, and good beer.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: A really cozy and affordable place to eat in Amsterdam, the food was delicious and had free water, definitely going back when we return to Amsterdam.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Friendly local cafe/bar by a canal. Good selection of sandwich options and tastey bitterballen

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Warm and friendly staff, yummy bitterballen and cozy atmosphere

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Came here just for a quick coffee but the staff were so friendly and welcoming! Beautiful location too right on the canal. Would definitely come back again.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Best sandwich I've ever had. Would fly back 5,460 miles just for this place.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Awesome place to relax on the channelâ€™s side. Cheap prices and very big portions.  Not far from the museums, but outside of touristic roads;)

Review Text: This place was advertised in Google maps as LGBTQ+ but in reality it is very mixed with local workers and some tourists (although not many) attending as well as some gay people. â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: good beer, friendly staff and amazing bites, like seriously that was great :)

Name: Mankind

Review Text: Nice place to have a drink and a sandwich. Food is okay.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Rude staff member (Should be trained better and treat customers with more kindness).

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Lovely quiet bar right next to canal. Nice moderately priced sandwiches for lunch.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: If you are in Amsterdam i highly recommend you to stop at the cafe Mankind for your lunch or just far have a drink. There sandwich are just amazing, the seat by the canal send you to a total peaceful place. The service was great and very â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: A lovely bar / restaurant with inside seating and terrace seating overlooking a square and a small seating area with a canal view. The establishment is spotlessly clean and the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. Although the menu â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: This is a new favourite place in Amsterdam. I ordered a steak... and I was astonished how seriously good it was, beer as well. Service was warm and welcoming. â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Amazing sandwiches, lovely staff and local beers, who could ask for more!

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Great spot, very relaxing and peaceful cafe beside the canal. We had some sandwiches here for lunch and they were very fresh and tasty. You also can order load of drinks as it's also a bar. Service was fast and friendly and helpful. You could stay here for hours and hours to treat yourself some drinks or chatting with friend.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: One of the nicest places I've had a drink in Amsterdam. The food was cheap but very tasty. The waiter was so friendly and made our time there very enjoyable. I'll recommend to everyone I know travelling to Amsterdam.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: lovely cafe, next to the canal. friendly staff, and had a nice lunch for a good price.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: A nice place, typical Amsterdam, but they doesn't have Croissant, or something Italian style for breakfast

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Very good toast. Nice place near the water. Highly recommended

Name: Mankind
Review Text:
Food was amazing in this place, has a nice view to the canal.
All the sandwiches we order were just right, broad selection of beer which makes grabbing a quick lunch perfect!

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Cozy Amsterdam bar.  they are friendly and reasonably priced.  they have fresh healthy choices on the menu ad a good selection of beer.  You will find locals here on a regular basis throughout the day enjoying the patio along the canal.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Very friendly people in a neighborhood kind of bar. Just a nice place to hang out, drink and shoot the $#!t with locals, all of whom spoke English the night  I was there. â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Used to be a great bar and I've been going there constantly over the last 5 years. Unfortunately they decided to maximize the short term profit and started under-filling beers and being rude to returning customers as they're sure the â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Very nice place on the canal. Relaxed owner. Delicious food and fast service. Good vegetarian options also. Lived up to it's name of relaxed and accepting.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Great canal side location near museums. Menu includes a variety of  sandwiches, soup of the day, salads,  beer, wine and spirits. Good service - simple menu. Very pleasant.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: My wife and I spent two days in Amsterdam and during our travels, went into quite a few Cafe's and restaurants. In Mankind, we were warmly greated, and had great conversations with the bartender, Frank. We liked it so much that we came back â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Great atmosphere, great beer, fantastic panini!

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Great place for a sit down, drink, and meal after visiting the rijkmuseum. We had the steak and chips with some wine, very tasty. Atmosphere is nice, place is cosy with a good view, friendly staff and bangin' 80s tunes.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Great prices! Even better food and drinks! I went with my friends and we loved the atmosphere. The bartender was incredibly nice

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Fabulous peaceful little bar cafe with tables overlooking a quiet stretch of canal. Delicious food great beer and charming staff. Great place to chill and  unwind !

Name: Mankind
Review Text: So friendly! Really welcoming towards two tired tourists seeking refuge from the bitter cold of a January night. Upon seeing our shivering state, the biggest Jaegermeister's ever were immediately offered and happily received.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Lovely people. Really tasty IPA from Walhalla local brewery. Didn't try the sandwiches but they looked really tasty too. Oh and a tiny  sunny terrace!

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Friendly owner. stumbled upon it when trying to find a place a bit from van gogh museum without knowing itâ€™s popularity. delicious sandwiches at a great price

Name: Mankind
Review Text: A real Amsterdam local with fresh cooked simple food - try the chicken sate - excellent. Very welcoming people. Best value so close to the Rijks.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Local pub/cafe overlooking a canal with good prices and a casual vibe.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Warm, fresh sandwiches, friendly staff (they spoke English, German and Dutch), menu is in Dutch and English and available in German and Portuguese. WiFi is free

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Small variety of drinks and rude staff, including mispricing drinks to non locals, had to argue to pay the regular price. â€¦

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Rob and Greg are fantastic!! Beautiful loving atmosphere, very intimate! Best cappuccino and G&T i have had in Amsterdam! A classy place to visit :) i will be returning on my next visit to Amsterdam!

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Very tasteful food, relaxed international atmosphere, friendly and promptly service. Ideal mix local pub and interesting people. Pleased to meet you here. Close to rijksmuseum, yet out of the masses.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Very nice  and quite location! The atmosphere is fantastic! It is self service but the gentleman at the bar was very kind!

Name: Mankind
Review Text: I'm a kiwi expat living in Amsterdam and really enjoyed visiting this cafe out of the tourist zone. Good food, pleasant friendly owners and gay friendly too.  Recommended.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: I was one of their first customers something like 30 years ago.  Always a nice place to go. A real neighborhood bar.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Nice food and great beer! Cheers

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic staff. Really friendly, good conversation and tasty beer. Would definitely come again. 100%

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Mankind has a fantastically friendly staff, great food, terrific prices and a good beer selection, and it's only a few minutes walk from the Museumplein. The place can't be beat.

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Great service, friendly people

Name: Mankind
Review Text: Nice menu. Simple but well prepared food. Very friendly staff.

Name: Mankind
